description: This Rust source file defines various metric types (BasicMetric, StateMetric, BrowserMetric) and their corresponding observable implementations (BasicMetricObservable, StateMetricObservable, BrowserMetricObservable). It includes methods for creating, updating, and notifying observers about metric changes, along with unit tests for these functionalities.

classes.name: BasicMetric
classes.description: Represents a simple numeric metric with a name and value.

classes.name: StateMetric
classes.description: Represents a state change metric with a name, state, and timestamp.

classes.name: BrowserMetric
classes.description: Represents a browser-specific metric with name, URL, load time, and memory usage.

classes.name: BasicMetricObservable
classes.description: Observable implementation for BasicMetric, managing observers and notifying them of updates.

classes.name: StateMetricObservable
classes.description: Observable implementation for StateMetric, managing observers and notifying them of updates.

classes.name: BrowserMetricObservable
classes.description: Observable implementation for BrowserMetric, managing observers and notifying them of updates.

methods.name: new
methods.description: Constructor for each metric and observable class, initializing internal state.

methods.name: update_metric
methods.description: Updates the current metric and notifies observers.

methods.name: add_observer
methods.description: Adds an observer to the observable.

methods.name: remove_observer
methods.description: Removes an observer from the observable.

methods.name: notify_observers
methods.description: Notifies all registered observers about a metric update.
